name: To Duel List
description:
* Display FULL SCREEN*

-

Languages: SPANISH/ ENGLISH

-

A teenager angry with the world, a list of tasks ... accompany him on what seems like a totally normal day: visit different beautiful and colorful scenarios, solve puzzles, meet his picturesque family...

...

although not everything will always be as beautiful as it seems.

CONTROLS:

-Movement: WASD

-Interaction: Mouse

A game by:

Julia Cajigal (Rocket Raw) - @rocket_raw

Raúl Arenas (Naburo) - @naburo_rae

Ernesto Jimenez (Zernimax) - @zernimax

Specially made for the Spain Game Devs Jam II #SGDJamII from the 21th to the 28th of September

Topic: DUEL

2º place WINNERS in the NARRATIVE  category

All sprites, animations, character designs and music have been created by us in the span of one week. Sound effects from Freesound.
